title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Friday 29 December 2017 - BBC News
summary: 'christmas terror plot ' pair appear in court .
strike set to affect new year 's eve trains .
snow warnings across the east midlands .
football : forsyth signs new rams deal .

documents.title: exeter 30-6 leicester
text: exeter 30-6 leicester
author: Kris Holland
BBC Sport

documents.title: liverpool 2-1 leicester city
text: liverpool 2-1 leicester city
author: Emma Sanders
BBC Sport

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it for east midlands live for 2017 , we 'll be back from 08:00 on tuesday 2 january .

documents.title: weather : milder night ahead
text: dry with clear spells at first this evening , giving frosty conditions for a time .
however , thickening cloud will bring outbreaks of rain from the west after midnight , perhaps starting as snow on the derbyshire hills .
lows of 3c ( 37f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: fourth man arrested over basford crash
text: a 20-year-old man has been arrested after a car crashed in nottingham and a gun was reportedly fired .
two men , aged 19 and 36 , and a 15-year-old boy were arrested on boxing day after reports of a crash in arnold road , old basford .
police said they had reports the firearm was discharged at the vehicle shortly before or after the collision .
the men and boy arrested on tuesday have now been released pending further investigation .
the fourth man is being questioned .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: watch : man , 46 , knocked unconscious in bar
text: police have released this cctv footage of a man being knocked unconscious in a bar , in a bid to help find his attacker .
the assault happened in revolution , in loughborough , at around 23:30 on friday 22 december .
the 46-year-old man sustained a fracture to his skull in the attack and is still undergoing treatment .
a 46-yr-old man was knocked unconscious in revolution , baxter gate # loughborough around 11.30pm , fri 22 dec .
the victim sustained a fracture to his skull and is still undergoing treatment .
if you recognise the man in this footage please dm us or phn 101 , quoting 17559173
i 've rtd the original tweet
i hope you can find him but i ca n't help but wonder why nobody was trying to get rid of the guy
unfortunately you have to ask yourselves was this person known to or friends of the door staff ?
was that the reason he was able to just walk away ? ?
additionally not identified by the door entry scanning system in place .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: no england recall for tuilagi
text: leicester centre manu tuilagi has not been included in an england training squad for a two-day camp in brighton .
tuilagi , 26 , has not played for the national team since march 2016 and has just returned to domestic action following his most recent injury .
tigers trio ben youngs , george ford and dan cole have been included .
the camp starts on 1 january .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: thieves break into salon on christmas day
text: the owner of a chain of hairdressing salons has admitted a number of break-ins at one of his shops has cost him around £ 20,000 .
there have been six burglaries at barrie stephen in king street , leicester , in the last year , with the latest being on christmas day night , the owner said .
mr stephen said the costs come from insurance claims , stolen stock and repairs .
he added that he would like to put bars or shutters on his window , but is prevented from doing so because of a conservation order in the king street area of the city .
`` from a small business point of view it is devastating , '' he told bbc news .
leicestershire police added that it attended the salon late on christmas day and are still investigating the break in .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: m1 crash cleared
text: collison cleared by our @ twitterid # trafficofficers and all lanes open on the # m1 southbound between j25 and j24a .
delays remain back to j26 .
have a safe journey .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: man taken to hospital after city centre crash
text: east midlands ambulance service has said a man was taken to hospital after he was hit by a bus in nottingham this afternoon .
`` we sent a paramedic in an ambulance car , a doctor in a car and a crewed ambulance to the scene , '' a spokeswoman said .
the crash happened on derby road in canning circus at about 14:45 .
the man is being treated at the queen 's medical centre but no details about the extent of his injuries have been released .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: derbyshire roads re-open
text: all are back open , except snake pass .
re-opened roads : four roads closed earlier due to heavy snow have now re-opened following work by snow plough teams .
a6024 holme moss , a537 cat & fiddle , a53 leek road , a5004 long hill , are now open & passable with care .
a57 snake pass remains closed - currently being ploughed .
how 's the snake pass looking now please ?
hi martyn .
still closed , but we 're working to re-open as soon as possible .
we 'll bring you updates as we have them .
thanks
great work !
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: plan to merge vulnerable family services
text: services for vulnerable families in leicestershire look set to be merged .
if the plans are approved , eight full-time jobs will go , and £ 1.5m will be saved .
the county council has insisted it wo n't affect the quality of the service .
agencies including children 's centres , the youth offending service and the supporting leicestershire families scheme are set to come under one umbrella - a family wellbeing service
of the 40 buildings across the county , used by vulnerable families , 25 will close .
councillor ivan ould , said the most needy `` will not notice any different '' .
however he said : `` those who are emerging or maybe borderline or threshold may find they will have to wait longer to qualify . ''
the plans are currently out to consultation and come into effect in 2019 if approved .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: breakingpedestrian hit by bus
text: one lane of derby road in nottingham has been closed after a man was hit by a bus .
it happened in canning circus at about 14:45 , a nottinghamshire police spokesman said .
we 'll bring you more on this as we get it .
author: Lewis Scrimshaw
News editor, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: outdoor classes boosting children 's friendships
text: children who spend more time outdoors at school get along better with their peers , research has found .
academics from loughborough university studied children at so called `` forest schools '' in the county - an idea that originated in scandinavia .
it involves children taking part in woodland activities - including shelter building - as part of their curriculum .
dr janine coates , from loughborough university , said the youngsters involved also spoke about having more friends .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: postponement set to cost racecourse thousands
text: thursday 's postponement of racing at leicester due to weather is set to cost the course at least £ 20,000 in refunds .
around 750 people had pre-booked tickets for the fixture , but the snow and ice meant racing could not go ahead .
in addition to the refunded tickets , a spokesperson for the course said losses on food , drink and hospitality is set to cost them `` many , many thousands '' .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: travel : three-car crash on m1
text: traffic looks like it 's at a standstill .
# m1 southbound between j25 and j24a - lane 3 closed due to a collision inv : 3 cars .
@ twitterid # trafficofficers on scene .
expect delays .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: forsyth agrees new derby contract
text: forsyth agrees new derby contract

documents.title: woman dies after crash
text: a young woman has passed away in hospital after a collision in chesterfield , her family has said .
author: Derbyshire Times

documents.title: hunt for development sites in peak district
text: the peak district national park is inviting landowners and property developers to send in suggestions of areas that could be suitable for houses and businesses .
each suggested site will be considered against a set of criteria to determine whether it 's suitable for development .
policy planner ian fullilove said : `` the consultation provides an opportunity for the national park to look ahead to the future where development is concerned .

`` like all national parks , the peak district has the challenge of balancing development demands without impacting on the special qualities of the area that make it so important to those who live and work within and beyond its boundaries . ''
sites can be submitted until 19 january .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: experienced defender signs new rams deal
text: derby county defender craig forsyth has signed a new deal until 2020 .
there is an option for the contract to be extended by a further year .
`` fozzy [ forsyth ] has been at the club for a while and his recent performances have certainly merited a new deal , '' manager gary rowett told ramstv .
the scotland international has played 150 times for derby after joining from watford in 2013 .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: weather : yellow warning still in place
text: rain and snow clearing however over northern routes there could still be some snow and ice on the ground so a yellow warning for snow remains in place until 15:00 .
yellow means be aware that there could be tricky driving conditions .
there should be some drier and even brighter weather this afternoon as rain moves away with highs of 6c ( 43f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: chatsworth house roads cleared after snow
text: chatsworth house tweets
the roads are now fine on the estate and no more snow is forecast .
please do take care when travelling !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: terror charge pair remanded in custody
text: a fish-and-chip shop owner and another man have appeared in court accused of preparing to build a bomb in the lead up to christmas .
andy sami star , 31 , of sheffield road , chesterfield , and farhad salah , 22 , of brunswick road , sheffield , are jointly charged with a single count of preparing an act of terrorism .

westminster magistrates court heard that the pair , appearing on a video link from leeds , allegedly researched and prepared bomb ingredients for an attack on the uk and recorded test explosions on a smart phone .
deputy senior district judge ikram tan remanded the pair in custody before they next appear at the old bailey on 19 january .

documents.title: have you seen missing teenager ?
text: madison broxton from derbyshire has been missing since the early hours of yesterday morning .
the 16-year-old , from chapel-en-le-frith , may have travelled to burnley , lancashire .
madison , who lives on manchester road , is described as white , 5ft 3in tall with a slim build and straight , black shoulder length hair .
she was wearing a grey hoody with black leggings and black trainers and has two tattoos - one of roman numerals on her left collarbone and the other a black and grey rose on her left wrist .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: musa facing uncertain leicester future
text: leicester boss claude puel has not ruled out ahmed musa leaving the club in the january transfer window .
the 25-year-old nigerian forward has played just once this season for the foxes and has not featured at all under puel .
`` it 's not the time to speak about if he can bring something to the squad or if he can leave the squad in january , '' puel told bbc sport .
`` we 'll look at all the players .
at the moment the status quo remains . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: barmaid 'grabbed by neck '
text: a woman grabbed a bar worker by the neck after she refused to serve her in belper last night , police have said .
it happened at the monk bar in king street at about 23:30 .
the woman , thought to have been in the bar with her father , was described as white , 5ft 2ins tall with brown hair in a ponytail .
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: travel : long delays on m1
text: recovery completed on the # m1 southbound between j29 and j28 and all lanes are clear following a collision .
long delays remain however will start to ease .
thanks for your patience
author: Dave Wade
BBC News

documents.title: new £ 2.9m bridge to link nottinghamshire town and village
text: funding for a multi-million pound bridge that will support the development of hundreds of new homes has been approved .
author: Nottingham Post

documents.title: anti-slavery boss dies aged 54
text: the head of the government 's anti-slavery agency has died .
paul broadbent set up the gangmasters and labour abuse authority ( glaa ) in nottingham after leaving a top job with the county police force .
he was passionate about tackling modern slavery .
from his headquarters in the city , mr broadbent was leading the fight to stop workers across the country being exploited by unscrupulous employers .
he recently recruited the glaa 's first investigators , who 'd begun using new powers to police every industry for modern slavery .
the glaa has said mr broadbent was warm , funny , and generous , a champion for the vulnerable and his sudden death , at 54 years old , is a `` shattering tragedy '' .
author: Jeremy Ball
Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: dinosaur goes on display at zoo
text: an eight-foot-tall , moving tyrannosaurus rex dinosaur model has gone on show at twycross zoo .
the 17-foot-long structure , which visited the zoo earlier this year , will be on display alongside some baby dinosaurs .
`` they were immensely popular , '' ryan floyd , from the zoo , said .
`` so we figured there was no better way to round off the year by bringing them back again . ''
the models are on show until sunday .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: strike set to affect new year 's eve trains
text: rail services across the east midlands will be significantly disrupted on new year 's eve if planned strikes by members of the rmt union go ahead .
crosscountry has produced a reduced timetable for sunday in the event of the strike not being called off .
it will not be operating a service to or from nottingham and none of its trains will be stopping at hinckley , narborough or south wigston in leicestershire .
there will be trains from leicester , melton mowbray , oakham , derby and chesterfield .
the union has called the strike over its concerns about working patterns and sunday pay .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: your snowy east midlands
text: parts of the region have had a dusting of the white stuff this morning .
here 's kirkby muxloe in leicestershire .
castleton in derbyshire .
and worksop , nottinghamshire .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: watch : shopkeeper uses karate on armed robber
text: a shopkeeper has described how he used karate to overpower a robber who was pointing a gun at him .
sibu kuruvilla 's young daughters hid in a storeroom at the shop in evington , leicester , where they saw what was happening on cctv .
a 17-year-old has been arrested and questioned by police in connection with the raid .
author: Caroline Lowbridge
BBC News

documents.title: snow warnings in place
text: there 's an amber warning for snow in force for derbyshire until 11:00 today .
routes over higher ground and hills could see 10-15cm of snow , which could cause travel disruption .
there 's also a yellow warning for snow in nottinghamshire with , in particular , northern parts of the county seeing some snowfall that could lead to travel disruption .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: pair due in court over 'christmas terror plot '
text: two men have been charged with terror offences by police investigating an alleged plot for an attack over christmas .
andi sami star , 31 , from chesterfield and farhad salah , 22 , from sheffield , have been charged with engaging in the preparation of an act of terrorism .
both men will appear via video link at westminster magistrates ' court in london later .
the pair were among four men arrested on 19 december .
author: BBC News

documents.title: travel : latest from region 's roads
text: here 's the latest from the region 's roads :
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to the final east midlands live for 2017 .
dave wade and i will be guiding you through the region 's news , sport , weather and travel until later .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC News
